title: The Trident Recipe
full_text:
The Trident Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
aquavit
1
ounce
Cynar
1
ounce
dry sherry
2
dashes
peach bitters
Thin strip of lemon peel
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink, and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, bar spoon, bar strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
